First strike, menace
[i]Wolfberg[/i] – Whenever an equipped creature you control becomes blocked, defending player sacrifices a creature blocking them.
[i]The Conqueror[/i] – Whenever an opponent casts a spell, exile the top card of that players library. You may play that card for as long as that cards remains exiled and may spend mana as though it was any color to cast it.
